mapper.select: SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_WRITE_DATE FROM BOARD WHERE BOARD_DEL_FL = 'N' AND GROUP_NO = #{groupNo} ORDER BY BOARD_WRITE_DATE DESC FETCH FIRST 5 ROWS ONLY

SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, TO_CHAR(BOARD_WRITE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "BOARD_WRITE_DATE" FROM BOARD WHERE BOARD_DEL_FL = 'N' AND GROUP_NO = #{groupNo} AND BOARD_TYPE_CODE = 1 ORDER BY BOARD_WRITE_DATE DESC FETCH FIRST 5 ROWS ONLY

SELECT BOARD_IMG_NO, BOARD_IMG_PATH, BOARD_IMG_ORIGINAL_NAME, BOARD_IMG_RENAME, BOARD_IMG_ORDER, B.GROUP_NO, BOARD_IMG_PATH || BOARD_IMG_RENAME AS "FILE_LOCATION"
FROM "BOARD_IMG" BI LEFT JOIN "BOARD" B ON (B.BOARD_NO = BI.BOARD_NO)
WHERE B.GROUP_NO = #{groupNo} FETCH FIRST 6 ROWS ONLY

SELECT CASE WHEN SCHEDULE_DATE - CURRENT_DATE = 0 THEN 'day' ELSE TO_CHAR(SCHEDULE_DATE - CURRENT_DATE) END AS D_DAY, TO_CHAR(SCHEDULE_DATE, 'MM"월" DD"일" HH24"시" II"분" "("DY")"') AS SCHEDULE_DATE, LOCATION, TO_CHAR(COST, 'L999,999') AS COST, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SCHEDULE_MEMBER SM WHERE SM.SCHEDULE_NO = B.SCHEDULE_NO ) AS "MEMBER_COUNT"
FROM SCHEDULE B
WHERE B.GROUP_NO = #{groupNo} AND SCHEDULE_DATE >= CURRENT_DATE ORDER BY SCHEDULE_DATE DESC FETCH FIRST 6 ROWS ONLY
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO INVITE VALUES(#{memberNo}, #{groupNo}, DEFAULT, DEFAULT)
